update ZL_LSH
JYRQ = #{jyrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SCBZ = #{scbz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JYJG = #{jyjg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GH = #{gh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GQPH = #{gqph,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WLBH = #{wlbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZDR = #{zdr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZDRQ = #{zdrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SHR = #{checker,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SHRQ = #{shrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
bhg = #{bhg,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ManufactureType = #{manufacturetype,jdbcType=CHAR},
ISOK_pk2200 = #{isokPk2200,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ISOK_pk2400 = #{isokPk2400,jdbcType=INTEGER},
isYB = #{isyb,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ischange = #{ischange,jdbcType=INTEGER},
GLPH = #{glph,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ismini = #{ismini,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
isYellow = #{isyellow,jdbcType=INTEGER},
isCoatingYC = #{iscoatingyc,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where JYDH = #{jydh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update ZL_LSH set JYRQ = #{jyrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SCBZ = #{scbz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JYJG = #{jyjg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GH = #{gh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GQPH = #{gqph,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WLBH = #{wlbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZDR = #{zdr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZDRQ = #{zdrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SHR = #{checker,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHRQ = #{shrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, bhg = #{bhg,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ManufactureType = #{manufacturetype,jdbcType=CHAR}, ISOK_pk2200 = #{isokPk2200,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ISOK_pk2400 = #{isokPk2400,jdbcType=INTEGER}, isYB = #{isyb,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ischange = #{ischange,jdbcType=INTEGER}, GLPH = #{glph,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ismini = #{ismini,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isYellow = #{isyellow,jdbcType=INTEGER}, isCoatingYC = #{iscoatingyc,jdbcType=INTEGER} where JYDH = #{jydh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
insert into ZL_LSH (JYDH, JYRQ, SCBZ, JYJG, GH, GQPH, WLBH, ZDR, ZDRQ, SHR, SHRQ, bhg, ManufactureType, ISOK_pk2200, ISOK_pk2400, isYB, ischange, GLPH, ismini, isYellow, isCoatingYC) values
(#{item.jydh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.jyrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.scbz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.jyjg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.gh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.gqph,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.wlbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.zdr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.zdrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.checker,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.shrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.bhg,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.manufacturetype,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.isokPk2200,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.isokPk2400,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.isyb,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.ischange,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.glph,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.ismini,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.isyellow,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.iscoatingyc,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.select: select fqxh, fqcd cd, fqdm bs from ZL_LSH a inner join zl_lsh_fqxx b on a.JYDH = b.jydh where cast(b.jydh as varchar) + cast(b.fqxh as varchar) not in (select cast(b.jydh as varchar) + cast(b.fqxh as varchar) from ZL_LSH a inner join zl_lsh_fqxxmx b on a.JYDH = b.jydh where GQPH = #{gqph,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) and GQPH = #{gqph,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and isnull(fqdm, '') = '外端' and isnull(shr, '') = ''
select * from ZL_LSH where shr is not null and gqph = #{gqph,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select gqph, 0 cd, '' bs from ZL_LSH where isnull(shr, '') = '' and GQPH = #{gqph,jdbcType=VARCHAR} union select GQPH, fqcd cd, fqdm bs from ZL_LSH a inner join zl_lsh_fqxx b on a.JYDH = b.jydh where GQPH = #{gqph,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and isnull(fqdm, '') = '外端' and isnull(shr, '') = ''
